item.title: Amethyst Shortcuts - MacOS Tiling Window Management
item.author: Author
item.description: I was very satisfied about the productivity of i3wm under Linux. Amethyst is the replacement that I found under MacOS. I list the default shortcuts with some organizations for getting used to it.
